At Sat, 18 Jul 2009 12:15:47 +0800,
Utsav Saraf wrote:
>
> Hi Erik,
> Firstly, Thanks for taking time out to look into this. I have removed maven
> 1.1 and installed 1.0.2 from the archive. I am using Ubuntu and jdk 1.5
> package from sun itself. Even after commenting out that portion I am not
> able to build the product. It fails on a plugin.jelly file without giving
> any information about it.
> I need to integrate htmlunit with heritrix to crawl webpages with JS
> obfuscation so the binary would not help.

Hi Utsav -

I am happy to help. There is some information here
<http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/5632>
which should help with the plugin.jelly problem, which is due to a
dependency (qdox) not being available.

It is strange that you see a problem with sun.net code with the Sun
javac. You might post a longer extract about this to the mailing list
to see if others can help.

best,
Erik Hetzner
